pr_title: Extract new test utils - to be used in app and IT tests.

timeline.author: EricWittmann

timeline.bodyText:
We need to do something about this - it breaks every time the version # changes.  I wonder if the default code can be updated to actually look for a pattern:  ../app/target/apicurio-registry-app-$VERSION-runner.jar
Not something that is relevant to this PR, just an observation. :)  I'll open a ticket.
timeline.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText: Yeah, was thinking the same ... @Frawless any idea?
replies.author: alesj

replies.bodyText: Not sure if it's possible to get it from pom somehow. Maybe it could be parsed (it's xml) and get it from there. We do something similar in Strimzi.
replies.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: We could just use some file system code to search a directory for a file of the right pattern.
replies.author: EricWittmann

timeline.bodyText: This change loses the test method name from the topic name.  That seems like potentially useful debugging information lost - do we not care?
timeline.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText: For topics I guess we could leave it, for artifactIds it needs to be something unique, as now we get 2 runs of the same test - non-cached vs cached client.
replies.author: alesj

timeline.bodyText: Here too - we're going to be losing potentially important context info.  Perhaps a variant of these generate methods that can take a string to use as part of the name?
timeline.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText: Nah, this doesn't pose any useful info, at least it didn't for me.
replies.author: alesj
